headers.subject: SV: MySQL standalone application
headers.received: from unknown (HELO hfr001.hfrgruppen.local) (194.192.150.126) by www.mysql.com with SMTP; 5 Nov 2002 09:31:50 -0000

body.para: -----Oprindelig meddelelse----- Fra: Eric Martel [mailto:eric.martel@tricktronic.com] Sendt: 5. november 2002 04:46 Til: win32@lists.mysql.com; plusplus@lists.mysql.com Emne: MySQL standalone application
First I would like to apologize for my English... I hope you'll understand me.

What I'm looking for is a standalone library for Win32 that would allow me to use the power of MySQL without having to set up a server. What I mean is that I need a "server" that allows me to execute queries, but that is close to the rest of the PC/network. So basically, what I'm asking for is a lib similar to MySQL++ that doesn't require a properly set server, by emulating its' server or something... There must be somebody somewhere that has done it before? If so, where could I get more infos about it?
I tried to search the whole mailing groups, but I couldn't find an answer.
Sorry if this mail doesn't belong to your mailing lists...
body.footer: --------------------------------------------------------------------- Please check "http://www.mysql.com/Manual_chapter/manual_toc.html" before posting. To request this thread, e-mail win32-thread10040@lists.mysql.com
body.para: To unsubscribe, send a message to the address shown in the List-Unsubscribe header of this message. If you cannot see it, e-mail win32-unsubscribe@lists.mysql.com instead.
